channel.title: Got No-ip, what now?
channel.description: I read the guides on how to make my own private server, but it doesn't say anything after you get no-ip... I dont know what to do now and how to make it go to my server and be on the server status page. can someone help me or copy and paste a guide?[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 02:06:34 PM[/size][hr]....[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 04:53:15 PM[/size][hr]no1 knows how?

item.title: Got No-ip, what now?
item.dc:creator: @Exist2inspire Exist2inspire
item.description:
@Exist2inspire wrote:

[quote=“Tupac Pk®, post:12, topic:151784”]get a source edit it a tad save it then compile then run it then post a section in the server status page.
oh and btw. to post a topic on the server status page go to the bottom or top and look for post server or w/e then just put pics ur and ur info. and for hamachi servers go to the hamachi server status page.[/quote]

That makes 0 sence to what hes asking for…

Read full topic

@Exist2inspire wrote:

1337pker:

i did exactly that but it sais error connecting and server checker sais the server has to be online[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 07:44:20 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know why it sais error connecting??[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 07:53:21 PM[/size][hr].

it’s pretty straight forward lol… you just have to have your server running…

Read full topic

item.title: Got No-ip, what now?
item.dc:creator: @1337pker 1337pker
item.description:
@1337pker wrote:

[quote=“Exist2inspire, post:6, topic:151784”]firstly, download no-ip duc:
http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

install it and it will ask you for your account name and password, you can get one here:
http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

log into your no-ip account and go to host/redirects and click add, fill out the info and your done.

next open up no-ip duc and right click in the hosts section and go to refresh, you should see your one you created, so click it. now just give the name of that redirect to someone along with the port and they should be able to log into your server.[/quote]

i did exactly that but it sais error connecting and server checker sais the server has to be online[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 07:44:20 PM[/size][hr]does anyone know why it sais error connecting??[br][size=1]Posted on: October 14, 2007, 07:53:21 PM[/size][hr].

Read full topic

item.title: Got No-ip, what now?

item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

download no-ip add a host??

Read full topic

item.title: Got No-ip, what now?
item.dc:creator: @Exist2inspire Exist2inspire
item.description:
@Exist2inspire wrote:

firstly, download no-ip duc:
http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

install it and it will ask you for your account name and password, you can get one here:
http://www.no-ip.com/downloads.php

log into your no-ip account and go to host/redirects and click add, fill out the info and your done.

next open up no-ip duc and right click in the hosts section and go to refresh, you should see your one you created, so click it. now just give the name of that redirect to someone along with the port and they should be able to log into your server.

Read full topic

item.title: Got No-ip, what now?
item.dc:creator: @person1936 person1936
item.description:
@person1936 wrote:

so after you have the update client and yu have a no-ip name example: “anti-lag.no-ip.info”
then if you have a firewall you need to open up a port (doen’t affect your server port) you can set it for use alternative port so you only have to open up that port AND the server port to that computer you are running the server on. then you put that as your ip on the serverstatus page. if you need anymore help pm me

Read full topic
